data.decision: Redesign Cinematch homepage with fresh creative direction while maintaining brand tokens
data.rationale: Current homepage has 8 sections with standard layout. User requested completely new design while following existing brand guidelines (void/obsidian dark theme, gold/teal accents, Inter/Playfair fonts). Opportunity to create more distinctive, emotionally resonant experience that better captures the cinematic nature of film-music collaboration.
alternatives: Keep existing layout with visual polish only
Complete brand overhaul including new colors
data.context: Cinematch is a platform connecting filmmakers with composers. Target audience: directors, producers, music supervisors. Competitors: Scorefolio, traditional talent agencies. Value prop: curated profiles, search by vibe, direct messaging.
